summary: A utility module that defines reusable condition helpers for Home Assistant, offering functions to evaluate entity states, numeric thresholds, time windows, sun events, geographic zones, and template expressions, as well as factories to construct these condition callables from configuration data.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant automations to assess a wide range of environmental and entity-based criteria in a consistent, configurable manner, simplifying the creation and execution of conditional logic across the platform.
